attributes.action: Dismiss anyone in parliament for fraudulent expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All parliamentary members undergo a disciplinary process when they have made a false expenses claim. The House of Parliment should be seen as no different to members of the public. Members of the cabinet who allegedly make a false expenses claim should undergo a suspenson of their duties while a full investigation is undertaken. If guilty they should undergo a disciplinary process. A false claim should be treated as fraud and hence a gross misconduct issue.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
